lyrics.text:
‘Oiau ‘a e monū’ia ha taha ‘oku ‘ilo ē
Ko ‘ene hia kotoa pē kuo fakamolemole;
‘Oku ‘ikai kei lata ia ke nofo ‘i māmani,
Kae tangi hono ‘atamai, “Ko langi hoku ‘api.”

“Neongo hono fuʻu mamaʻo, ka ‘oku kite mai,
‘O u sio loto ki he fakataha ‘oku fai:
Ko e ngaahi laumālie ‘oku kofu hinehina,
Mo ‘ai kalauni mo e teunga lāngilangi’ia.

“Oku nau fa’iteliha he ‘Akau na ‘o e Mo’ui,
Koloa hotau fa’ahinga kuo loa pē hono puli;
‘Oku nau inu noa he fauniteni ‘o Vaiola,
Si’i matavai he fiefia ‘a e ‘Eiki ko Sihova.”

“Ko Sīsū ‘ena ‘oku lotoloto ‘enau tuʻu;
Fai fakahā pē ‘ene tauhi, ‘ikai kei fufū:
Pea vale honau loto ‘ene malimali mai,
‘O nau ha’aki fulipē ha ‘aleluia lahi.”

“’Ā, ko e hā ha me’a ‘i heni ke ta’ofi au?
He hangē ‘oku kamo mai ‘a Sīsū ke te haʻu;
Mo e kau ‘āngelo na ‘oku nau ta’alo mai.
‘Ā tuku ho’mou puke au, ke u ‘alu pē ki langi.”
